prompt.focus: Make sure the photodiode is covering the spot and any external recordings have begun before continuing.
prompt.fullscreen: Press 'cmd + ctrl + F' to toggle Fullscreen.
prompt.zoom: Zoom in to enlarge the screen.

welcome.large_window: Please make this window as large as possible.

instructions.introduction: Let's play Stroop, a color matching game! Make sure you're in a comfortable position, with the time to focus for the duration of the task.
instructions.camera: Make sure the camera is pointing to you and your face is within the camera area.
instructions.check_event_marker: Make sure the event marker is connected and then continue.

ask.diagnoses: Have you ever been diagnosed with Parkinson's disease, Schizophrenia, Obsessive-Compulsive Disorder, or Depression?

ius.preamble:
This questionnaire is designed to measure intolerance of uncertainty.
Please answer the following questions as honestly as you can.
There are no right or wrong answers, and there are no trick questions.
ius.frustration: 2. It frustrates me not having all the information I need.
ius.full_life: 3. Uncertainty keeps me from living a full life.
ius.surprise_avoid: 4. One should always look ahead so as to avoid surprises.
ius.unforeseen_spoil: 5. A small unforeseen event can spoil everything, even with the best of planning.
ius.uncertainty_paralysis: 6. When it's time to act, uncertainty paralyzes me.
ius.uncertainty_malfunction: 7. When I am uncertain I can't function very well.
ius.future: 8. I always want to know what the future has in store of me.
ius.surprise_intolerance: 9. I can't stand being taken by surprise
ius.doubt_paralysis: 10. The smallest doubt can stop me from acting.
ius.organize: 11. I should be able to organize everything in advance.
ius.escape: 12. I must get away from all uncertain situations.

ius.not: 1 - Not at all characteristic of me

slider.right: Move the slider to the right.
slider.left: Move the slider to the left.
